thread.section_title: The Darlington Hyde Park - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great value for money
thread.title_full: Great value for money - Review of The Darlington Hyde Park, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: SteinOK
title: Great value for money
text: Super place to stay in London if no luxery hotel is needed. Clean and quiet. Situated close to Paddington and Hyde Park, it was only a 20minute walk to Oxford Street. Roomsize varies alot, we had three rooms on different flors, but all of them was nice and clean with good beds. Not run by English, however, the English breskfastbwas great. Always served with a smile. Recommend this hotel for a visit in London.
